text: “O nguazir kamɨn gumazim, Babilonian atrivim uan mɨdorozir sabam suiragh izamin tuavir pumuning amɨsefe. Tuavir kamning uaghara kantrin vamɨran ikegh izam. Nɨ tuavir akar kamningɨn bizitam osirigh anesaragh. Eghtɨ atrivim izɨ an ganigh fogham, tuavir mam Amonian nguibar ekiam Raban zui. Tuavir akar igharazim, a kantri Judan nguibar ekiam Jerusalemɨn zui.
